comment:
Had a sample of this at my friend’s apartment. Aged 8 years and 9 months, this is great stuff, better than the 8 Year Greedy Angels. Rum and Tropical Aging always match. 


Nose: Vanilla, Caramel, Guava, Pineapple, Mango, Papaya, Passion Fruit, Cherry, Chocolate, Peach

Palate: Barley, Pineapple, Oak, Chocolate, Guava, Apricot, Peach, Pepper

Finish: Pepper, Guava, Vanilla, Pineapple, Caramel, Mango, Peach
